name: Rumours

ingredients.item: drops El Guapo Love Potion No. 9 bitters

preparation:
Add all the ingredients into a shaker and dry-shake (no ice).
Add ice and shake until well-chilled.
Top with 4 drops of El Guapo Love Potion No. 9 bitters and a splash of juice from a jar of Luxardo maraschino cherries.
Garnish with a lemon twist and Luxardo maraschino cherry.
